parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: The function to be executed at each interval tick.

parameters.name: options.delay
parameters.description: Delay in milliseconds. If null, the interval will not start.

parameters.name: options.executeImmediately
parameters.description: If true, the callback runs once instantly before the first delay. Default: false.

parameters.name: options.maxExecutions
parameters.description: The maximum number of times the interval should run before self-cancelling.

parameters.name: options.startOnMount
parameters.description: Whether the interval should begin automatically when the component mounts. Default: true.

returnValues.name: cancel
returnValues.description: Stops the current interval and sets isActive to false.

returnValues.name: executionCount
returnValues.description: The total number of times the callback has been successfully executed.

returnValues.name: isActive
returnValues.description: Reactive state indicating if the interval is currently running.

returnValues.name: reset
returnValues.description: Clears the current interval, resets the executionCount to zero, and restarts.

returnValues.name: start
returnValues.description: Starts or restarts the interval based on the current configuration.
